product.title: Simba and the Big Flood | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Simba and the Big Flood

The beloved characters featured in Disney’s acclaimed film The Lion King make a comeback in this richly illustrated, action-packed book. When the river in Pride Land is flooded by a torrential rain, Simba, Timon, and Pumbaa come to the aid of Bahati, a young giraffe, and help rescue his mother, who is trapped on an island. Throughout the course of their adventure, the characters develop respect for the power of nature and a new appreciation of teamwork and camaraderie.

Tie-in Activity: Talk about the forces of nature, and ask your child to think of situations when nature has presented dangerous conditions in your neighborhood. Use a map to trace the routes of local rivers, creeks, and streams in your home state.
